Text: If these books were banned they wouldn't be available from Amazon. They may not be at your local public library because they mostly stock books of interest to the general public or of lasting cultural significance which none of these are.
Thanks for these. Not banned exactly but shunned by the dominant misandrist feminist culture. This took courage.
These books are not stocked in public libraries because feminist librarians deem them not to be of 'lasting cultural significance' in our matriarchal society.
